name: Eat-Da-Burger
description: Eat-Da-Burger! is a restaurant app that lets users input the names of burgers they'd like to eat. Whenever a user submits a burger's name, this app will display the burger on the left side of the page -- "waiting to be devoured".   Each burger in the waiting area also has a "Devour it!" button.    When the user clicks it, the burger will move to the right side of the page.   This app will store every burger in a database, whether devoured or not.
